title: AFK in an entire ranked match - with no loss prevention is unfair! Rectify it.

embed.description: This Photo was uploaded by Rygeki.

body: This is absolute BS Riot. I'm so sick of this Ranked system, and i'm sick of having my time, effort and LP wasted because of having an AFK from 30 seconds into the game! (Which was our ADC) I can see why people decide to troll now, because 0 fucks are given about the players and the unfair games we consistently put up with. Especially when the AFK's/Trolls don't even get punished anyway! All they will cop is a measly time penalty before they queue up from LEAVERBUSTER. So tell me why should we have to lose our LP for such shitty reasons? Our team definitely deserved a loss prevention because we played much better than the enemy team despite such a huge DISADVANTAGE, and we even finished the game with a better kill count 58/42/101 to 42/58/71, yet we lose the game and our LP because we're outnumbered. Fix your System Riot, because this is one of the main reasons this game has such a bad community. Sincerely every league player in the OCE region.

replies.body: Riot thinks that a 4 v 5 game is fair. plain and simple they don't give a crap about the people who lose from AFK's the whole game.
